title: Loving Hut - Daegu
description: Part of international chain of vegan restaurants opened by followers of Supreme Master Ching Hai, an advocate for veg living. Menu includes salads, sandwiches, burgers, sushi and Korean dishes with tofu or meat-flavored soy dishes. Has photo menu. Also sells a small selection of vegan products. In 2015 it move here from 1794-7, Daemyeong 2-dong; now close to subway station National University of Education.
